name: Rail Rider (Rithm Gaming)
description:
Rail Rider About the game

Inspired by the theme of balance during Score Space 8, Rail Rider takes the player along a grinding adventure along an absurdly long and twisty rail

Making of

Tools

  • Unity (2018.4.19f1)
  • Blender
  • Visual Studio
  • Butler

Inspired by the old grind mechanics of Tony Hawk Pro Skater

Support

Please leave any feedback in the comments below.
